name: Yandere Schoolgirls Online
description:
The virtual world of Yandere Schoolgirls Online! It's an amazing 3D experience where you can customize, explore & dress up! Become a virtual Japanese Schoolgirl or School Boy!


FEATURES of Yandere Schoolgirls Online
Play at DAYLIGHT or at NIGHT just equipped with your Flashlight
Hundreds of Quests and Dialogue Options
A huge big School Building Complex is about to be explored
Customize your Avatar in ANY way you can imagin
Customize ANY NPC in this game in any way you like. You can create your absolute unique school girls (boys) experiences
Create your own Clan or join Clans
Collect Runes, make your Avatar outstanding
Use your Horse to ride around the School
Compare yourself with other players in the Leaderboard
Personalize your Avatar. Choose different Idle, Walking and Running AnimationsBuild

FEATURES of School Girl A.I. Simulator - Sandbox Multiplayer Game
Build anything what you want.
Scale, rotate, move and tint objects
Build daylight or night Maps.
Save as many worlds as you like.
Build as much as you want. Build whatever you want.
Huge selection of objects, planets, props and so on.
Share your Maps with other players in the same room.
Host your own Maps
Conquer the Leaderboard.
Many amazing Runes to unlock.
Endless Fun.
Infinite Customization Opportunities
Free Outfits!
